attributes.name: iconFromType
attributes.description: calculate an icon based on the type that was used

attributes.name: calcText
attributes.description: Calculate text based on the type in the event we have no default.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Text place holder for describing this place holder element.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: A media type to visualize and also bubble events off of.

attributes.name: drag-over
attributes.description: Bind dragging state to a variable so we can apply CSS.

attributes.name: directions
attributes.default: "Double click or drag and drop file to replace"
